data.Name: NICO Touches the Walls
data.Bio: NICO Touches the Walls is a Japanese rock band which consists of vocalist/guitarist Mitsumura Tatsuya (光村龍哉), guitarist Furumura Daisuke (古村大介), bassist Sakakura Shingo (坂倉心悟), and Tsushima Shotaro (対馬祥太郎) on drums. Formed in 2004, NICO Touches the Walls won the LOTTE Prize at the 2004 YAMAHA TEENS’ MUSIC FESTIVAL. They made the indie debut with Senha & Co. and are now signed to Ki/oon Records. In November 2019 Read more on Last.fm
